Description: Statistical identification of isoform switching from RNA-seq derived quantification of novel and/or annotated full-length isoforms.
bio.tool description: Enables identification of isoform switches with predicted functional consequences from RNA-seq data. Consequences can be chosen from a long list but includes protein domains gain/loss changes in NMD sensitivity etc. It directly supports import of data from Cufflinks/Cuffdiff, Kallisto, Salmon and RSEM but other transcript qunatification tools are easy to import as well.
